title: S&P Technology Sector Equal Weight Index Methodology

issues.title: NYSE trading day specification could be more explicit
issues.description: Document mentions '5 NYSE trading days' but doesn't explicitly state this excludes NYSE holidays
issues.original_text: 5 NYSE trading days prior to effective date
issues.suggested_fix: 5 NYSE trading days (excluding weekends and NYSE market holidays) prior to effective date

strengths: Clear constituent selection criteria with specific thresholds
Complete rebalancing procedure with specific dates and times
Explicit index calculation formula with all variables defined
All data sources specified with vendor names
All parameters have specific numeric values
